name: raster
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a computer image, etc.) based on a rectangular grid (= pattern of lines and columns) of pixels (= small dots): PNG is a graphics file format for raster images. The digitized raster file was imported into the computer and displayed on the display monitor screen as an image. A raster image is also known as a bitmap and is created from rows of small dots which are called pixels ("picture elements") or "bits".
More examplesFewer examplesAn image is called a bitmap or raster image if its objects or contents are represented by pixels.Because a raster format uses a fixed method of specifying an image, the image cannot always be immediately rescaled without losing definition.
